documentation.text:
@title JobBoard v3 — On-chain Job Board with Applications + Proposals
 NEW FEATURES:
 ---------------
 ✔ Freelancer Applications (applyToJob)
 ✔ Applicant pagination (getApplicants)
 ✔ Applicants tracking per job
 ✔ Jobs applied by freelancer (getJobsAppliedBy)
 ✔ withdrawApplication
 ✔ Optional: requireApplicationToHire
 ✔ Optional: freelancerFactory verification
 PROPOSAL EXTENSION (BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE):
 ---------------
 ✔ Applicant now stores optional proposal data (URI, bid, deliveryDays)
 ✔ Existing applyToJob(uint256) kept (fills empty proposal fields)
 ✔ New overloaded applyToJob(uint256,string,uint256,uint64)
 ✔ New view getApplicantDetails(jobId, freelancer)
 ZERO BREAKING CHANGES:
 ---------------
 - postJob() unchanged
 - updateJob() unchanged
 - cancelJob(), reopen() unchanged
 - EscrowFactory integration unchanged
 - markAsHired() still works the same UNLESS requireApplicationToHire = true
@notice Original application function (no proposal data). Kept for backwards compatibility.

@notice Extended application with proposal URI, bid and delivery estimate.
 @dev Same name, different signature (overload). Safe for existing integrations.
